name: Lombre
description: LOMBRE is nocturnal - it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief-maker. When this POKéMON spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually recovers HP in rain.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be confused.  If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
